[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-1″ pix_over_visibility=”” bottom_divider_select=”19″ b_has_animation=”true” b_2_animation=”fade-in-up” b_3_animation=”fade-in-up” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_pt“:“60“,“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-40px“,“pix_res_md_pt“:“60“}” css=”.vc_custom_1646725633016{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}” fade_in_intro=”185″ b_2_delay=”150″ b_3_delay=”300″][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646206013216{margin-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”33788″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”]

Awarded as Asia's Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education!

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646206738857{margin-top: -80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”33737″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”33738″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_pt“:“20“,“pix_res_sm_pb“:“20“,“pix_res_md_pt“:“40“,“pix_res_md_pb“:“40“}” css=”.vc_custom_1613448640162{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646214495881{margin-top: 85px !important;}”][vc_column content_align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10″][vc_single_image image=”33739″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”]

1st Digital Marketing Multi-Million Dollar Training Company

Digiperform raised $3.6 MN funding with HT Media

[vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1589321720499{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

+0

Centers in India
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

+0

Students Trained
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

+0

Students Placed
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” bottom_divider_select=”8″ bottom_layers=”1″ top_divider_select=”8″ top_layers=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1613442888984{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #f8f9fa !important;}”][vc_row equal_height=”yes” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

Digiperform could never win over a long run without impeccable pioneers who believed in the same mission and understood how to achieve it. In 2014, Digiperform was born under two astounding duos; Manu Jolly, a serial entrepreneur, and Vaibhav Vats, a digital marketing savant.

[vc_empty_space]

Mr. Manu Jolly

Director, CEO

Manu Jolly, who was born to be an entrepreneur, began his career by accomplishing many ventures like Complanet, KNM Services Private Limited and went on to become India-Head – Banking and Finance Services at Hinduja Global Solutions Ltd. He conceptualized the idea of a digital marketing agency, Mobiz Digital, and co-founded Digiperform in 2014.

[vc_empty_space]
Connect on LinkedIn
[vc_empty_space]

Mr. Vaibhav Vats

Co-Founder, Director

Vaibhav Vats is one of the pioneers in Digital Marketing training in India who worked for various US-IT firms and led a team for an IT startup. During his tenure, he forecasted that Digital Marketing would boom in India in the coming years.

The compact met in 2013 where they discussed the scope of improvement, future, and the need of the industry for a more robust training organization. With determination and lots of discussions, they came to the simple observation:

‘People are just not looking for theoretical knowledge; they are seeking for practical exposure with 100% job assurance.’

[vc_empty_space]
Connect on LinkedIn
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646222624271{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1613442102576{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”33453″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”]

The Digiperform Journey

[vc_empty_space height=”12px”]

Digiperform is the largest “Exclusive Digital Domain Specific” training provider in India.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646215755890{margin-top: 15px !important;}”][vc_column width=”7/12″][vc_single_image image=”33745″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″]

Our curriculum is designed and updated by the content panel of over 50 experts from across the digital marketing industry; combining the endorsements & suggestions by 450 knowledgeable corporates across Asia. The curriculum has been created after surveying job requirements of over small and big digital marketing agencies and corporate houses with in-house digital marketing wings to provide hands-on training with a mix of practical, research and assignments.

[vc_empty_space height=”12px”][vc_single_image image=”33760″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-1″ pix_over_visibility=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_pt“:“20“,“pix_res_sm_pb“:“20“,“pix_res_md_pt“:“40“,“pix_res_md_pb“:“40“}” css=”.vc_custom_1646222157140{padding-top: 0px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}” el_id=”pix_section_overview” section_name=”Overview” fade_in_intro=”185″][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” pix_visibility=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1600559430630{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column content_align=”text-center”]

Awarded by WCRC (World Consulting and Research Corporation)

With Vision “To Get People To Perform on Digital Marketing Products and Platforms”.
GET BROCHURE
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
